description: Unit tests for the 'tool' decorator and 'Function' class in the 'agno.tools' module, testing synchronous and asynchronous functions, generators, parameter handling, and type hints.

methods.name: test_sync_function_decorator
methods.description: Tests the decorator on a synchronous function, verifying the Function object properties and execution.

methods.name: test_async_function_decorator
methods.description: Tests the decorator on an asynchronous function, verifying the Function object properties and async execution.

methods.name: test_sync_generator_decorator
methods.description: Tests the decorator on a synchronous generator function, verifying the Function object and generator output.

methods.name: test_async_generator_decorator
methods.description: Tests the decorator on an asynchronous generator function, verifying the Function object and async generator output.

methods.name: test_decorator_with_parameters
methods.description: Tests the decorator with custom parameters, verifying the Function object's properties.

methods.name: test_decorator_preserves_type_hints
methods.description: Ensures that type hints are preserved in the decorated function's entrypoint.

methods.name: test_decorator_preserves_async_nature
methods.description: Verifies that the decorated async function remains a coroutine function.
